answers.answer: Hi,I forgot to mention that previous blood work indicates that my thyroid is functioning perfectly, and there is nothing to suggest I have diabetes.Lily905

question: Hi,Used to get my period on 24th of every month.  Approximately 6 months ago, my period became irregular in that it was coming sooner like on the 19th, then the 16th, then the 13th and now the 7th.  Also, the length of period has decreased from 4-5 days to about 2-3 days.  What's going on?Other Information:* I'm 26.* I'm a little more tired than normal, but tests revealled I am not anemic (nor diabetic).* I have no pain.* Diet, exercise, and weight have not changed.* Sex drive is the same.Any thoughts on what may be going on, and any tests that I should request my GP perform?Thanks in Advance,Lily905
title: Irregular Menstrual Cycle
